itemDescription: Scottish golfer and rugby union player (1869-1937)

wikipedia_page.main: David Donaldson Robertson (21 March 1869 – 13 September 1937) was a Scottish sportsman who represented Great Britain and Ireland at golf in the 1900 Summer Olympics, and also played international rugby for the Scotland.
